pr_title: TINKERPOP-2350 Fixed bug in Traversal.clone() in gremlin-python

timeline.bodyText: (nitpick) Any reason not to use the anonymous traversal source here?
timeline.author: FlorianHockmann
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -82,3 +82,22 @@ def test_anonymous_traversal(self):
         assert 0 == len(bytecode.bindings.keys())
         assert 0 == len(bytecode.source_instructions)
         assert 0 == len(bytecode.step_instructions)
+
+    def test_clone_traversal(self):
+        g = Graph().traversal()

timeline.message:
TINKERPOP-2350 Fixed bug in Traversal.clone() in gremlin-python

Needed to deep copy bytecode.
